# ISingleStoreConnectorLogger interface

Implementations of [`ISingleStoreConnectorLogger`](./ISingleStoreConnectorLogger.md) write logs to a particular target.

```csharp
public interface ISingleStoreConnectorLogger
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [IsEnabled](ISingleStoreConnectorLogger/IsEnabled.md)(…) | Returns `true` if logging for this logger is enabled at the specified level. |
| [Log](ISingleStoreConnectorLogger/Log.md)(…) | Writes a log message to the target. |
